titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation for the vessel Compass Rose III.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 100-423.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 795.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/10/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
